about_the_game:
Imagine you went to the crapper and emerged an hour later to a monster apocalypse!
Retro first-person shooter action inspired by 90's classics!



Save your friends and family. Save the world... from going all to crap!
You are family man Mike Hadley. Returning to work after your favourite lunch buffet required an immediate visit to the restroom. That's when it really hit the fan. Now you must fight your way through the monster horde to save your loved ones!



Old-school local deathmatch and co-op!
For up to 4 players, just like your grand-pappy used to play!
Nothing beats bumping elbows with buddies next to you on the couch as you send a shotty blast upside their damn fool heads!



Features:
  • Many scenarios to play including classic Free-for-all, King Of The Hill, Tag, Hold The Flag, Limited Lives, Golden Gun, and more
  • Play in teams including 2-vs-2, 1-vs-3, and 2-vs-1-vs-1
  • Plenty of monsters to blow to smithereens, showering chunks of bloody gore
  • Shotguns, assault rifles, rockets, grenade launchers, proxy mines, lazers, and more. Oh my!
  • Levels designed for increased encounters and fast-paced showdowns
  • Complete objectives in each level to move on or die a glorious death while trying!
  • Just the right amount of dookie

content_descriptors.notes: Blood and gore in retro-style graphics. Violence against humans and human-like characters, including dismemberment. Mature and harsh language. Some fart and poo jokes.

name: Call Of Dookie Demo
short_description: Imagine you went to the crapper, and emerged an hour later to a monster apocalypse! Retro first-person shooter action inspired by 90's classics! Old-school local deathmatch & co-op for up to 4 players!
